sourcesContent:
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import ArrowDropDownIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ArrowDropDown'; import { useAppContext } from '../../context/context'; import './ProductDetail.css'; const ProductDetail = ({ product }) => { const [{}, dispatch] = useAppContext(); const { category, title, image, price, description } = product; return (
{category}

{title}

${price}
dispatch({ type: 'SET_PRODUCTS', payload: 'All', }) } > Back To Products dispatch({ type: 'ADD_TO_CART', payload: product, }) } > Add To Cart

Product Detail

{description}

); }; ProductDetail.propTypes = { product: PropTypes.object, }; export default ProductDetail;
